ncl.team22.languagetutor.data
Class LanguageEntity

java.lang.Object
  ncl.team22.languagetutor.data.LanguageEntity

public class LanguageEntity
extends Object

Class to represent a LanguageEntity, a word or phrase to be used in the application

Author:
Ben Wheatley

                        int currentrep,
                        int repinterval,

Sets the progress.

Parameters:
efactor - The new easiness factor
currentrep - The new value of number of repetitions
repinterval - The new repetition interval
repnextdue - The next time this entity will be repeated

setLearnt

public void setLearnt()
If no entry in the entity_progress table exists then create one, with repetition_nextdue set to 0, signifying the entity has been learnt but not yet reviewed
